discover.instruction: Read about someone's schedule. Notice the highlighted prepositions.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о чьём-то расписании. Обрати внимание на выделенные предлоги.

content.text: I'm very busy! <highlight>On</highlight> Monday, I have a meeting <highlight>at</highlight> 9 AM. <highlight>In</highlight> the afternoon, I have training. <highlight>On</highlight> Tuesday and Wednesday, I work from home. <highlight>At</highlight> night, I study English. <highlight>In</highlight> the evening, I usually relax. My birthday is <highlight>in</highlight> March - <highlight>on</highlight> the 15th. I was born <highlight>in</highlight> 1995. I'll see you <highlight>on</highlight> Friday <highlight>at</highlight> noon!
content.question: When do we use 'in', 'on', and 'at' for time?
content.question_ru: Когда мы используем 'in', 'on' и 'at' для времени?

points.example: at 9 AM, at noon, at midnight, at night, at the weekend (UK)
on Monday, on Friday, on 15th March, on Christmas Day, on my birthday

points.rule: IN - longer periods (months, years, seasons, parts of day)
points.rule_ru: IN - длинные периоды (месяцы, годы, времена года, части дня)
points.example: in March, in 2020, in summer, in the morning, in the evening

points.rule: Exception: at night (NOT in the night)
points.rule_ru: Исключение: at night (НЕ in the night)
points.example: I work at night. (BUT: in the morning/afternoon/evening)

points.rule: No preposition: this, last, next, every
points.rule_ru: Без предлога: this, last, next, every
points.example: this Monday, last week, next year, every day

comparison_table.examples: at 5 PM, at noon, at night
in June, in 2020, in the morning
this week, last year, next Monday

notice.instruction: Find all time prepositions. Identify what type of time expression follows.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все предлоги времени. Определи, какое выражение времени следует за ним.

tasks.text: My daily routine: I wake up at 7 AM. In the morning, I have breakfast and read news. I go to work on weekdays. On Saturday, I sleep late. I was born in 1990, on December 25th. In winter, I like to stay home at night. I exercise in the evening, usually at 6 PM. I'm going on vacation next month. This Friday, I'm meeting friends.

exercises.instruction: Complete with in, on, at, or - (no preposition).

questions.sentence: We're going on holiday ___ next summer.

prompts: What do you do in the morning/afternoon/evening?
What do you do on different days?
produce.example: I wake up at 7 AM on weekdays. In the morning, I have breakfast and go to work. On Monday and Wednesday, I go to the gym. I was born in January, on the 20th. In the evening, I usually watch TV. At night, I read before sleeping. Last summer, I went to Italy.
criteria: Uses in for months/parts of day

texts.title: My Week
texts.content: On Monday, I start work at 9 AM. In the morning, I have meetings. On Tuesday, I work from home. At noon, I have lunch. In the afternoon, I write reports. On Friday at 5 PM, I finish early. At the weekend, I relax. In the evening, I watch movies.

texts.title: Life Story
texts.content: I was born in 1995, on June 12th. In my childhood, I lived in Moscow. In 2010, I started high school. I graduated in 2013. In the summer of 2014, I started university. I got my first job in 2018. In January, I got married. At night, I sometimes think about my journey.

texts.title: Party Invitation
texts.content: You're invited to my party! It's on Saturday, March 20th. The party starts at 7 PM. In the evening, we'll have dinner. At midnight, we'll watch fireworks! The party is on the last Saturday of the month. I hope to see you on that day!

texts.title: Work Schedule
texts.content: I work at a restaurant. On weekdays, I work in the evening. I start at 5 PM and finish at midnight. On Saturdays, I work at noon. In the morning, I usually sleep. At night, I'm always tired! On Sundays, I don't work.

texts.title: Seasons
texts.content: I love all seasons! In spring, flowers bloom. On sunny days, I go to the park. In summer, I swim at the beach. In autumn, leaves fall. On rainy days, I stay home. In winter, I go skiing. At Christmas, I visit my family.
